author: dhruba
msg: HADOOP-1841. Prevent slow clients from consuming threads in the NameNode.

author: sichen
msg: Cosmetic fix for OrderPaymentPreference:  When captures are deeclined, set the status to PAYMENT_DECLINED.  This makes more sense when looking at the results on orderview.  Previously, it wasn't even checking if the capture was declined or not and always setting them to Settled or Received, which is erroneous.
